events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team is excited to review your qualifications and experience.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster due to your experience with software development and coding.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your application to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
The initial screening interview was conducted successfully where we discussed your previous software engineering projects and technical skills in depth.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview scheduled next week.
Your technical interview has been successfully scheduled for May 20th at 2 PM UTC with our senior engineering panel.
You completed the technical interview with excellent problem-solving skills and coding knowledge as evaluated by our engineering team.
The HR interview has been arranged for you on May 23rd at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture and your fit within the team.
You successfully completed the HR interview, showing strong alignment with our core values and enthusiasm for the role.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer role with competitive salary and benefits reflecting your expertise.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about joining our engineering team.
You officially accepted the offer and confirmed your start date with enthusiasm and eagerness to contribute.
Your onboarding process has begun, including orientation sessions and setting up your development environment.
The hiring process has been successfully closed with you now fully integrated as a valued Software Engineer on our team.
